## Setup
```{r}
getwd()
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(sf)
library(scales)
library(nationalparkcolors)

mytilus.metals <- read.csv("./Data/Processed/ICES_Mytilusedulis_Cd_Pb_Hg_Cu.csv")
mytilus.metals$DATE <- as.Date(mytilus.metals$DATE, format = "%d/%m/%Y")

# create separate datasets for each contaminant
mytilus.pb <- mytilus.metals %>%
   filter(PARAM == "Pb")%>%
   droplevels()
mytilus.cd <- mytilus.metals %>%
   filter(PARAM == "Cd")%>%
   droplevels()
mytilus.cu <- mytilus.metals %>%
   filter(PARAM == "Cu")%>%
   droplevels()
mytilus.hg <- mytilus.metals %>%
   filter(PARAM == "Hg")%>%
   droplevels()


my.theme <- theme_minimal(base_size = 14)+
  theme(legend.position = "top")
theme_set(my.theme)
my.colors <- park_palette("CraterLake")[c(1,2,5,7)]
```

## ANCOVA to predict concentration based on year, metal, country
```{r}
ancova.allmetals <- lm(Value.mgperkg ~ MYEAR + PARAM + Country, data = mytilus.metals)
summary(ancova.allmetals)

ancova.Pb <- lm(Value.mgperkg ~ MYEAR + Country, data = mytilus.pb)
summary(ancova.Pb)

ancova.Pb <- lm(Value.mgperkg ~ MYEAR + Country, data = mytilus.pb)
summary(ancova.Pb)
```
